apply_for_direct_upload_description: Fill out this form to request access for uploading videos directly from your device. We'll review your application and get back to you.
why_direct_upload_label: Why do you want direct upload access?
why_direct_upload_placeholder: Tell us about the content you create...
application_submitted_description: Thank you for applying! We'll review your application and get back to you soon.
about_us_p1: We are a community of travelers, explorers, and storytellers passionate about discovering the beauty and diversity of India. Our platform is dedicated to sharing authentic travel experiences through short, engaging videos.
about_us_p2: Whether you're a seasoned traveler or just starting to explore, Bharatyatra is your window to the incredible landscapes, rich culture, and hidden gems of India.
our_mission_p1: To inspire and empower people to explore India by providing a platform for sharing real, user-generated travel stories. We believe that the best travel advice comes from fellow travelers.
our_vision_p1: To become the largest and most trusted community-driven travel platform for discovering and planning trips in India, one video at a time.
contact_us_p1: We'd love to hear from you! Whether you have a question, feedback, or just want to say hello, feel free to reach out to us through any of the methods below.
privacy_p1: Your privacy is important to us. This Privacy Policy explains how we collect, use, disclose, and safeguard your information when you use our mobile application.
privacy_p2: We may collect information about you in a variety of ways. The information we may collect via the Application includes:
privacy_l1: Personal Data: Personally identifiable information, such as your name, email address, that you voluntarily give to us when you register with the Application.
privacy_l2: User-Generated Content: Videos, comments, and other content you upload or post to the Application.
privacy_l3: Usage Data: Information automatically collected when you access and use the Application, such as your IP address, browser type, and pages you have viewed.
privacy_p3: Having accurate information about you permits us to provide you with a smooth, efficient, and customized experience. Specifically, we may use information collected about you to create and manage your account, personalize your experience, and monitor usage of the app.
privacy_p4: We do not share your personal information with third parties except as described in this Privacy Policy. We may share information with vendors, consultants, and other third-party service providers who need access to such information to carry out work on our behalf.
privacy_p5: You may at any time review or change the information in your account or terminate your account by logging into your account settings and updating your account.
privacy_p6: If you have questions or comments about this Privacy Policy, please contact us at privacy@bharatyatra.com.
disclaimer_p1: The information provided by Bharatyatra on our mobile application is for general informational purposes only. All information on the app is provided in good faith, however, we make no representation or warranty of any kind, express or implied, regarding the accuracy, adequacy, validity, reliability, availability, or completeness of any information on the app.
disclaimer_p2: The Application may contain (or you may be sent through the app) links to other websites or content belonging to or originating from third parties. Such external links are not investigated, monitored, or checked for accuracy, adequacy, validity, reliability, availability, or completeness by us.
disclaimer_p3: The views and opinions expressed in the user-generated videos and comments on the Application are those of the authors and do not necessarily reflect the official policy or position of Bharatyatra.
disclaimer_p4: The travel information is provided for general information and educational purposes only and is not a substitute for professional advice. Accordingly, before taking any actions based upon such information, we encourage you to consult with the appropriate professionals. The use or reliance of any information contained on this app is solely at your own risk.
